text: Catalpa Creek is a stream in the U.S. state of Mississippi. Catalpa Creek is a name derived from the Choctaw language purported to mean "dammed up or obstructed creek". Variant names are "Red Bull Creek" and "Tullapa Creek". ==References== Category:Rivers of Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Clay County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Lowndes County, Mississippi Category:Bodies of water of Oktibbeha County, Mississippi
title: Catalpa Creek
